creditline: Gift of funds from Ellen and Sheldon Sturgis, Richard and Roberta Simmons, and The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Indigo and white double ikat; two long panels sewn together and joined at the ends to form a tube; multi-colored randa; although primary color is indigo, pale beige, pink and purple ikat weft and warp stripes form a subtle plaid effect; ikat designs include tree, plant and floral motifs.
title: Woman's skirt (Corte)
